p:
Six thresholds of heat exposure have been selected from previous studies
1, 5, 46 for this analysis: light > 78 °F (25.6 °C); medium > 82 °F (27.8 °C); strong > 85 °F (29.4 °C); very strong > 88 °F (31.1 °C); extreme > 90 °F (32.2 °C); deadly > 95 °F (35 °C) (see Fig. S1 in the Supporting Information).
